@graph.name: Taco Pizza (Vegan & Super Easy) - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: This vegan taco pizza with lentil walnut meat is the perfect comfort food! It's one of my favorite recipes. I mean how much better can pizza actually get?!

@graph.headline: Taco Pizza (Vegan & Super Easy)
@graph.keywords: lentil walnut meat,lentil walnut meat recipe,taco pizza,taco pizza recipe,vegan pizza,vegan pizza recipe,vegan taco meat,vegan taco pizza,vegan taco recipe

@graph.name: Taco Pizza (Vegan & Super Easy)
@graph.description: This vegan taco pizza is the ultimate comfort food!

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the lentils according to the instructions. Drain and set aside. In a medium pan, roast the walnuts without oil for about 2 minutes or until they're lightly golden. Put the walnuts and the cooked lentils in a food processor and process until chopped. Make sure to leave some texture!
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the lentils according to the instructions. Drain and set aside. In a medium pan, roast the walnuts without oil for about 2 minutes or until they're lightly golden. Put the walnuts and the cooked lentils in a food processor and process until chopped. Make sure to leave some texture!

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sautée the onions for about 3 minutes. Then add the lentil walnut mixture and stir in the tomato paste. Cook for 2 minutes. Add the diced tomatoes and the spices (paprika powder, cumin, oregano) and season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: In a medium pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sautée the onions for about 3 minutes. Then add the lentil walnut mixture and stir in the tomato paste. Cook for 2 minutes. Add the diced tomatoes and the spices (paprika powder, cumin, oregano) and season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 385 °F and bake the pizza dough for about 10 minutes until it's golden and crispy.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 385 °F and bake the pizza dough for about 10 minutes until it's golden and crispy.

recipeInstructions.text: After baking, evenly spread the pizza with vegan sour cream. Add a layer of the vegan lentil walnut meat and top with avocado, tomatoes, lettuce, corn, kidney beans, and vegan cheese. Sprinkle with red pepper flakes. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: After baking, evenly spread the pizza with vegan sour cream. Add a layer of the vegan lentil walnut meat and top with avocado, tomatoes, lettuce, corn, kidney beans, and vegan cheese. Sprinkle with red pepper flakes. Enjoy!
